name: deployment
description: Returns information about the current deployment operation.

name: environment
description: Returns information about the Azure environment used for deployment.

name: extensionResourceId
description: Returns the resource ID for an [extension](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-resource-manager/management/extension-resource-types) resource, which is a resource type that is applied to another resource to add to its capabilities.

fixedParameters.name: resourceId
fixedParameters.description: The resource ID for the resource that the extension resource is applied to

fixedParameters.name: resourceType
fixedParameters.description: Type of the extension resource including resource provider namespace

name: managementGroup
description: Returns the scope for a named management group.

fixedParameters.name: name
fixedParameters.description: The unique identifier of the management group (not the display name).

name: pickZones
description: Determines whether a resource type supports zones for a region.

fixedParameters.name: providerNamespace
fixedParameters.description: The resource provider namespace for the resource type to check for zone support

fixedParameters.name: resourceType
fixedParameters.description: The resource type to check for zone support

fixedParameters.name: location
fixedParameters.description: The region to check for zone support

fixedParameters.name: numberOfZones
fixedParameters.description: The number of logical zones to return. The default is 1. The number must a positive integer from 1 to 3. Use 1 for single-zoned resources. For multi-zoned resources, the value must be less than or equal to the number of supported zones.

fixedParameters.name: offset
fixedParameters.description: The offset from the starting logical zone. The function returns an error if offset plus numberOfZones exceeds the number of supported zones.

typeSignature: (providerNamespace: string, resourceType: string, location: string, [numberOfZones: int], [offset: int]): array

name: providers
description: Returns information about a resource provider and its supported resource types. If you don't provide a resource type, the function returns all the supported types for the resource provider.

fixedParameters.name: providerNamespace
fixedParameters.description: the namespace of the provider

name: providers
description: Returns information about a resource provider and its supported resource types. If you don't provide a resource type, the function returns all the supported types for the resource provider.

fixedParameters.name: providerNamespace
fixedParameters.description: the namespace of the provider

fixedParameters.name: resourceType
fixedParameters.description: The type of resource within the specified namespace

name: reference
description: Returns an object representing a resource's runtime state.

fixedParameters.name: resourceNameOrIdentifier
fixedParameters.description: Name or unique identifier of a resource. When referencing a resource in the current template, provide only the resource name as a parameter. When referencing a previously deployed resource or when the name of the resource is ambiguous, provide the resource ID.

fixedParameters.name: apiVersion
fixedParameters.description: API version of the specified resource. This parameter is required when the resource isn't provisioned within same template.

fixedParameters.name: full
fixedParameters.description: Value that specifies whether to return the full resource object. If you don't specify 'Full', only the properties object of the resource is returned. The full object includes values such as the resource ID and location.

name: resourceGroup
description: Returns the current resource group scope. **This function can only be used in resourceGroup deployments.**

name: resourceGroup
description: Returns a named resource group scope. **This function can only be used in subscription and resourceGroup deployments.**

fixedParameters.name: resourceGroupName
fixedParameters.description: The resource group name

name: resourceGroup
description: Returns a named resource group scope. **This function can only be used in subscription and resourceGroup deployments.**

fixedParameters.name: subscriptionId
fixedParameters.description: The subscription ID

fixedParameters.name: resourceGroupName
fixedParameters.description: The resource group name

name: resourceId
description: Returns the unique identifier of a resource. You use this function when the resource name is ambiguous or not provisioned within the same template. The format of the returned identifier varies based on whether the deployment happens at the scope of a resource group, subscription, management group, or tenant.

fixedParameters.name: resourceType
fixedParameters.description: Type of resource including resource provider namespace

name: resourceId
description: Returns the unique identifier of a resource. You use this function when the resource name is ambiguous or not provisioned within the same template. The format of the returned identifier varies based on whether the deployment happens at the scope of a resource group, subscription, management group, or tenant.

fixedParameters.name: subscriptionId
fixedParameters.description: The subscription ID

fixedParameters.name: resourceType
fixedParameters.description: Type of resource including resource provider namespace

name: resourceId
description: Returns the unique identifier of a resource. You use this function when the resource name is ambiguous or not provisioned within the same template. The format of the returned identifier varies based on whether the deployment happens at the scope of a resource group, subscription, management group, or tenant.

fixedParameters.name: resourceGroupName
fixedParameters.description: The resource group name

fixedParameters.name: resourceType
fixedParameters.description: Type of resource including resource provider namespace

name: resourceId
description: Returns the unique identifier of a resource. You use this function when the resource name is ambiguous or not provisioned within the same template. The format of the returned identifier varies based on whether the deployment happens at the scope of a resource group, subscription, management group, or tenant.

fixedParameters.name: subscriptionId
fixedParameters.description: The subscription ID

fixedParameters.name: resourceGroupName
fixedParameters.description: The resource group name

fixedParameters.name: resourceType
fixedParameters.description: Type of resource including resource provider namespace

typeSignature: (subscriptionId: string, resourceGroupName: string, resourceType: string, ... : string): string

name: subscription
description: Returns the subscription scope for the current deployment. **This function can only be used in subscription and resourceGroup deployments.**

name: subscription
description: Returns a named subscription scope. **This function can only be used in subscription and resourceGroup deployments.**

fixedParameters.name: subscriptionId
fixedParameters.description: The subscription ID

name: subscriptionResourceId
description: Returns the unique identifier for a resource deployed at the subscription level.

fixedParameters.name: resourceType
fixedParameters.description: Type of resource including resource provider namespace

name: subscriptionResourceId
description: Returns the unique identifier for a resource deployed at the subscription level.

fixedParameters.name: subscriptionId
fixedParameters.description: The subscription ID

fixedParameters.name: resourceType
fixedParameters.description: Type of resource including resource provider namespace

name: tenant
description: Returns the current tenant scope.

name: tenantResourceId
description: Returns the unique identifier for a resource deployed at the tenant level.

fixedParameters.name: resourceType
fixedParameters.description: Type of resource including resource provider namespace
